name: 4x4 Offroad Tial Extreme Dark Edition
description:
4x4 Offroad Tial Extreme Dark Edition is a physics engine auto game.
Player drives an night mountains along with fully load trailers through difficult roads. To complete a missions player is required to have true 4x4 off-road driving skills. Game architecture is designed on real-time physics engine.
Real-time simulation like dust particles, smoke particles.
Enjoy the fun of controlling a crazy Four-wheel offroad Racing!
Race on high detailed tracks! This game is for all extreme sport enthusiasts including fans jeeps, trucks, 4 wheelers!

FEATURES
* Easy controller
* 4x4 off-road driving skills
* Beautiful night locations
* Realistic 4x4 physics


Like us at Facebook and stay tuned with all new games and updates
https://www.facebook.com/smartmovegames
